name: The Last Queen
description:
It is an adventure game where you will have as objective to change the destiny of your kingdom through a jump in time, you will look for the antidote and the keys that will help you return to the present in each level. Note that you can use your sword to fight against the darkness and destroy some barriers along the way.

Controls Move  Attack and destroy fake walls For restart the timeWASDSpaceF

Dashboard Trello

Repository Github
